entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 11:25 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.3°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -20.2°C
Wind: NNW 28 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the afternoon then flurries. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
